markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[No Stranger to Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=3608) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Lastwall Sentry](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=15)

**Prerequisites**
[Lastwall Sentry Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=882)

</column>

---

Your regular exposure to the insidious putrescence of undeath inured you to its effects. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws made against spells and effects with the [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), and [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64) traits. Whenever you become [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) or [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), reduce the status penalty you take from the condition by 1, to a minimum of 0.
name: No Stranger to Death

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 12" pfs="Standard" > No Stranger to Death Source Knights of Lastwall pg. 79 Archetype Lastwall Sentry Prerequisites Lastwall Sentry Dedication --- Your regular exposure to the insidious putrescence of undeath inured you to its effects. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws made against spells and effects with the death, disease, and evil traits. Whenever you become drained or sickened, reduce the status penalty you take from the condition by 1, to a minimum of 0.
